item.title: Wall Street Braces for Market Fallout After the U.S. Bombed Iran
item.description: Investors see stock market volatility, rising oil prices, and a stronger dollar ahead.

item.title: Chief Marketing Officers and CEOs May Be Misaligned. Could a Field Trip to a ‘Festival of Creativity’ Bring Them Closer Together?
item.description: The case for CEOs to make the trip to Cannes Lions.

item.title: Rest in Peace Fred Smith, Founder of FedEx (and Maybe the Luckiest Entrepreneur of All Time)
item.description: Is it better to be lucky or good? Why not both?

item.title: Think You Lack Emotional Intelligence? If 1 of These 4 Apply to You, Science Says You’re Wrong
item.description: Research shows you might have greater self-awareness, emotional regulation, and insight into others than you may think.

item.title: Do This 30-Minute Exercise Just Once to Make All Your Decisions Faster and Better
item.description: Decision coach Nell Wulfhart gives this exercise to her clients. Every entrepreneur should try it.
